thread.title: China’s Wind Energy Capacity To Triple By 2020, Says GlobalData
thread.title_full: China’s Wind Energy Capacity To Triple By 2020, Says GlobalData

title: China’s Wind Energy Capacity To Triple By 2020, Says GlobalData
text:
23 China’s Wind Energy Capacity To Triple By 2020, Says GlobalData 
Clean Technica: As global wind energy growth stabilizes, China’s growth is set to triple by 2025, reaching an estimated 347.2 GW by 2025, says GlobalData.Research and consulting firm GlobalData forecast in a report from earlier this year that China’s installed wind capacity will grow from 115.6 GW in 2014 to a whopping 347.2 GW by 2025. China’s growth will take place alongside a global stabilization towards the end of the forecast period, with annual installations peaking at 56.8 GW in 2022.
